name: Jamming Back Home
description:
THIS IS A PROJECT FOR THE GLOBAL GAME JAM 2019

In our game, you're an astronaut trying to go back to earth and evade a weird space tentacle monster by controlling the speed of the world. The game works best when played with a gamepad.
Basic controls:
Left stick/wasd = movement
Hold R2/L shift = Speed Up
Hold L2/ ctrl = Speed Down
A/Space = Dash

(Hint: stay near the bottom of the screen. You can lose the tentacles from your tail by speeding up.)
